author: remm
msg: - Redirection was not working on the root of a context

author: remm
msg: - HTTP redirect response (sendRedirect() call) was incorrect
- HTTP/1.1 : Will always make sure the connection is closed if a
status >= 400 is returned, to avoid any potential problem

author: craigmcc
msg: Implement buffering support in the ServletInputStream implementation when
reading the data portion of a request (such as the request parameters or
an uploaded file).  Buffering of the header reading is already implemented,
but should be merged with this support to avoid double buffering.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a message for exceptions thrown by session event listeners.
